open.title: Netstream | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting Netstream clients in Johannesburg, affected clients will experience no connectivity. We are working with Netstream and partners to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: FrogFoot outage | Benoni
open.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Benoni, affected clients will experience no connectivity. FrogFoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: TT Connect outage | Dowerglen, Edenvale
open.description: TT Connect has informed us of a network outage affecting Dowerglen, Edenvale, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. TT Connect engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre outage | The Arches of Rivonia, Edenburg
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting The Arches of Rivonia, Edenburg, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Rietvalleirand and surrounding areas
